block.p: GOLDBERG-Rita. Beloved wife of the late Samuel J. Loving mother of Dr. Morton Goldberg, Ronny Wittenberg, Richard Goldberg. Dear sister of Phillip Finkelstein. Cherished grandmother of Jeanine Hoffman, Suzanna Eads, Danielle Wilson, Brooke Wittenberg, Sara Goldberg and Debra Goldberg. Great-grandmother of Hannah Eads. Service Sunday, 11 AM, at Riverside, 21 West Broad St., Mount Vernon, NY.
